overview: Pranay, a middle-aged teacher of a village school filled with oversmart boys, is thrust with the responsibility to give them sex education. The film traces his personal and professional struggles to handle the controvertial and awkward topic with dignity and bring awareness about the subject in a conservative society.
tagline: Pranay, a middle-aged teacher of a village school filled with oversmart boys, is thrust with the responsibility to give them sex education.
title: Pranay Master 2021
